org.lwjgl.system.linux

Class Visual

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.system.linux.Visual
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class Visual
extends Struct
    Visual structure; contains information about colormapping possible.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Visual

        public Visual(long struct)
        Creates a Visual instance at the specified memory address.

      • Visual

        public Visual(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a Visual instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
